name: Earthbound Immortal Chacu Challhua
text:
Neither player can Summon "Earthbound Immortal" monsters. Once per turn, during the End Phase, if there is no face-up Field Spell on the field, destroy this card. If there is no face-up Field Spell, these effects are negated.
● This card can attack directly.
● Cannot be targeted for attacks, but does not prevent your opponent from attacking you directly.
● Unaffected by your opponent's Spell/Trap effects.
● Once per turn: You can inflict damage to your opponent equal to half this card's DEF. This card cannot attack during the turn you activate this effect.
● While this card is in Defense Position, your opponent cannot conduct their Battle Phase.
